WorkItem.Description:
I have a need to be able to open an excel 2010 macro enabled workbook from a Silverlight application and read data from a number of the sheets. I was able to do this with LiteExcel for Excel 2003 workbooks but it doesn't support the 2010 version.

Can anyone help.
WorkItem.Summary: Read a sheet from .xlsm file with Silverlight
